casebody.data:
POLICY ANALYSIS CO., INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-5033. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 11, 2003. Rehearing Denied June 11, 2003.

Before LOURIE, BRYSON, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
